test_scenarios.name: Search for a hotel in London and view the first result
steps: Enter 'London' in the destination search box.
Click on the first hotel listed in the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The hotel details page for the first London hotel is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a restaurant in Paris and view the first result
steps: Enter 'Paris' in the destination search box.
Click on the first restaurant listed in the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The restaurant details page for the first Paris restaurant is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Search for 'Things to do' in Rome and view the first result
steps: Enter 'Rome' in the destination search box.
Select 'Things to Do' from the dropdown.
Click on the first activity listed in the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The activity details page for the first Rome activity is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Register a new user account
steps: Enter a valid email address, username, and password.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User account is created and the user is logged in.

test_scenarios.name: Login with existing user credentials
steps: Enter a valid username/email and password.

test_scenarios.name: Write a Review for a landmark
steps: Click on the Eiffel Tower search result.
Click on the 'Write a Review' button.
Rate the landmark using the star rating system.
Enter a title and review text.
